metadata.title: CVE-2024-26739 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/sched: act_mirred: don't override retval if we already lost the skb Ifwe're redirecting the skb, and haven't called tcf_mirred_forward(), yet, weneed to tell the core to drop the skb by setting the retcode to SHOT. If wehave called tcf_mirred_forward(), however, the skb is out of our hands andreturning SHOT will lead to UaF. Move the retval override to the error pathwhich actually need it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
